basic_information.scholarship_name: KJ Tullis Memorial Scholarship in Management

description: The purpose of this scholarship is to provide funds for College of Business Management majors. Eligibility Requirements Complete qualifying application Must be a Management major Full time Student Minimum 2.75 GPA This scholarship is available to apply for during the current student application period.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
